# MySQL 5.5 新特性详解及参数优化 蓝皮书

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/mysql-5-5-xin-texing-xiangjie-ji-canshu-youhua-lanpishu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/mysql-5-5-xin-texing-xiangjie-ji-canshu-youhua-lanpishu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install mysql-5-5-xin-texing-xiangjie-ji-canshu-youhua-lanpishu
mysql-5-5-xin-texing-xiangjie-ji-canshu-youhua-lanpishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g mysql-5-5-xin-texing-xiangjie-ji-canshu-youhua-lanpishu
mysql-5-5-xin-texing-xiangjie-ji-canshu-youhua-lanpishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
